text: Barry Leslie Norman, CBE (21 August 1933 â€“ 30 June 2017) was a British movie critic, journalist and television presenter. He was best known for presenting Film... on BBC One from 1972 to 1998, the programme's longest-running host. He was the brother of script editor and director Valerie Norman. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:British critics Category:English television presenters Category:Journalists from London
title: Barry Norman
